title.rendered: SPECIAL. T. supports CFC initiatives in Darjeeling

content.rendered:
SPECIAL. T. supports CFC initiatives in Darjeeling

 

SPECIAL.T is honored to partner with the Child for Child team of Smile Foundation to help children from local communities in the tea estates in Darjeeling, India. The children going to Tea garden schools will be supported by CFC team for various outreach activities with privileged schools in the community.

Once the pandemic eases and schools reopen, the outreach programs will commence and so will the initiative to get Tea garden children enrolled in schools. Interactive programs will be organized for children and their parents with children and teachers from nearby privileged schools on topics like nutrition & healthcare. Children from privileged schools can take on the onus of each one teach one when situation normalizes. Activities that are shown in the images below are the ones that are planned for the children from schools in Tea gardens.

SPECIAL.T is part of the Nestlé Group. The brand launched its first tea machine in 2010, giving consumers the ability to brew single serve tea capsules at exactly the right temperature for exactly the right time. Simply at the push of a button, the SPECIAL.T tea machines prepare a perfect cup of tea each time you want it.
